name: Aria Moonshadow
backStory: Aria Moonshadow is a skilled Elven Sorceress who has devoted her life to protecting the ancient Mystic Enclave deep within the heart of Mystic Lands. Born with a natural affinity for magic, she spent her early years honing her abilities under the tutelage of the wise elders of her kin. When the darkness of the Shadow King began to encroach upon the land, Aria took up the mantle of Guardian, tasked with defending the realm against the malevolent force. With her courage, wisdom, and powerful spells, Aria sets out on a perilous journey to confront the Shadow King and restore light to Mystic Lands.
